nodes.bodyText:
Not sure how clear it is. I'm not native, so my opinion may not be very relevant here.
I doubt that most users know what the clipboard is. And it's strange to "copy" when something is not shown in the first place.
I never gave it a thought, but I believe what would make the most sense is to open an intent to share some information, then they could send it by email, copy it themselves...

nodes.bodyText:
Do you have any suggestions on improving the wording?
My worry is that the text sharing intent dialog may be even more confusing - it's often not very helpful to me (send via email, open in 5 versions of notepad etc...), but I haven't looked into it too much.
Open to opinions on this, I don't know, and an intent may be better

nodes.bodyText: I'm in opinion of asking someone who is not a dev' or who is trained in UX for help. I don't like that it would take time to do it, but I don't think I can tackle this kind of question without learning about human interaction. This is why I approved the PR, it's still an improvement and I've no solution that would not take a lot of time.
